name: IFICI regime with median income (€50,000)
description: Qualified professional under IFICI (Scientific Research & Innovation) regime with 20% flat tax rate

sources.description: IFICI regime provides 20% flat tax rate for qualified professionals
sources.notes: IFICI flat rate calculation: IRS=50000*0.20=10000; Social Security: 50000*0.11=5500; Total deductions: 15500; Net: 34500. Compare with standard regime (€30,294.43) - IFICI saves €4,205.57 on this income.
